restaurants.name: 24 Diner
restaurants.description: A modern take on the classic American diner serving breakfast all day.

restaurants.name: Kerbey Lane Cafe
restaurants.description: Local chain famous for its pancakes and queso served 24/7.

restaurants.name: Cisco's
restaurants.description: Historic East Austin joint serving Tex‑Mex breakfast plates and migas.

restaurants.name: Suerte
restaurants.description: Oaxacan‑inspired restaurant known for handmade masa and inventive cocktails.

restaurants.name: Sour Duck Market
restaurants.description: Laid‑back eatery with a giant patio serving locally sourced food and craft beers.

restaurants.name: La Barbecue
restaurants.description: Legendary pit‑smoked brisket, ribs and sausages served from a trailer with picnic tables.

restaurants.name: Uchi
restaurants.description: James Beard award‑winning sushi house famous for refined plates and omakase.

restaurants.name: The Driskill Grill
restaurants.description: Fine dining inside Austin's oldest hotel featuring elegant Texas cuisine.

restaurants.name: Jeffrey's
restaurants.description: Upscale Clarksville restaurant offering dry‑aged steaks and world‑class wines.

restaurants.name: The Continental Club
restaurants.description: Iconic South Congress club hosting nightly live music from rockabilly to blues.

restaurants.name: Antone's Nightclub
restaurants.description: Blues club founded by Clifford Antone; a staple of Austin's live music scene.

restaurants.name: Saxon Pub
restaurants.description: Small listening room hosting singer‑songwriters and bands nightly.

restaurants.name: Torchy's Tacos (Trailer)
restaurants.description: Austin‑born taco truck turned chain famous for creative fillings and queso.

restaurants.name: Franklin Barbecue
restaurants.description: World‑famous BBQ joint with long lines for melt‑in‑your‑mouth brisket.

restaurants.name: Arlo's Food Truck
